    # # this is the simplest possible csg file # # It defines the reading mechanism for instr 1 # to read score lines in order to draw straight lines #

    CsGraph.define do

    instr 1 do
  line p2, p2+p3, p5, p5  # x0 = p2, x1 = p2+p3, y0 = p5, y1 = p5
end

    end
